title: Transport Stocks Climb Near Record on Economic Growth Hopes
description: A gauge of US transportation stocks closed just shy of a record on Monday after its biggest rally in more than three weeks. The gains were the latest leg of a recovery from a long slump fueled by last year’s global trade turmoil.
